metadata.title: CVE-2024-21392 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
.NET and Visual Studio Denial of Service Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-21392` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspnetcore-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
aspnetcore-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-apphost-pack-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-host-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-hostfxr-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-sdk-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-sdk-7.0-source-built-artifacts - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-templates-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet7 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-7.0 - 7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dotnet7 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.117-0ubuntu1~22.04.1').
